name: Kike Tordera
title: Developer & UX / UI Designer
description: Kike is responsible for the whole software project. He first designed, and then coded the App from the initial concept until the final result that you are visiting right now.

name: Oskar joziak
title: UX / UI Designer
description: Oskar has helped to design and prototype the interfaces of the App. He also presented the project to a competition obtaining the second prime.

name: Obadiah Ekiru
title: Graphic Design
description: Ekiru made the whole stunning iconography, understanding and taking over with the different cultures to create a universal iconography.

name: Gabi Rocha
title: Graphic Design
description: Gabi designed the amazing logo, and the astonishing brand identity, including the design style that is applied in every icon and that she supervised.
